description: A representation of multiple registrations for the same entity

alternate_entities.description: array of entities that are linked via alternate registrations

publication_date.description: the publication date of the filing/notice that gives details of the alternate registration

start_date.description: date when alternate registration was valid from

sample_date.description: date when alternate registration was sampled

retrieved_at.description: date when alternate registration was retrieved

source_url.description: URL of the source of the data (e.g. download URL), or if there is not persistent URL the page from which it can be found (e.g. search page)
